entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Halifax (Shearwater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shearwater Airport 10:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: NE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
